title: Nomad Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Regularly offers an extensive vegan choice in starters, mains, desserts, salads, platters and pizza on a seasonal menu. Vegetarian meals have the choice to swap out dairy cheese for vegan cheese, including pizzas and salads. Wine list clearly states which are vegan. Food is locally sourced and organic.
